select id, code, name, sex, birthday, native_address, id_card, images, diploma, school_name, address, mail, phone, create_date, del_flag from archives_info where 1 = 1
AND code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{archivesInfo.code},'%')
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{archivesInfo.name},'%')
AND id_card LIKE CONCAT('%',#{archivesInfo.idCard},'%')
AND sex = #{archivesInfo.sex}
order by create_date desc
